title: Web Developer
description:
Developed a website from scratch using Laravel, JavaScript, HTML, and Tailwind CSS, replicating and enhancing the original design.
Optimized MySQL database performance, reducing query response times by 30%.
Added multilingual support (Spanish, English, Portuguese).
Built a backoffice system using 'Filament' a laravel package for efficient content management.
Improved UI/UX with a modern, responsive design.
Assisted in gathering and documenting business requirements in stakeholder sessions.
